TaskDescLanguage.1: Fight 10 dinosaurs, 10 Qitians, and 10 wild chickens in the arena
TaskDescLanguage.3: Add 5 gym points then come back to me to receive your reward
TaskDescLanguage.4: Well done, go to Linh Lam and kill 30 mimon
TaskDescLanguage.5: Reach level 5: Upgrade a skill to level 3
TaskDescLanguage.6: Continue to stop by Linh Lam to kill 30 pikachus, 30 little cats, and 40 baby turtles.
TaskDescLanguage.7: Reach level 6: enhance any equipment to level 5
TaskDescLanguage.8: Reach level 7: fight 30 white tigers in the great spirit realm
TaskDescLanguage.11: Fight the level 10 death boss in the arena
TaskDescLanguage.12: Go to the Great Spirit Realm and fight 300 white tigers
TaskDescLanguage.13: Go to Dai Linh scene and play 300 unicons
TaskDescLanguage.14: Go to the Great Spirit Realm and fight 300 Death Gods
TaskDescLanguage.15: Go to Dai Linh Realm and fight 200 crocodiles
TaskDescLanguage.16: Go to the Great Spirit Realm and fight 200 ferocious fire dragons
TaskDescLanguage.17: Go to the hunter at Linh Moc to receive your quest
TaskDescLanguage.18: Recently, there have been a lot of ferocious beasts. Please help me destroy them. Destroy 300 evolutions in Linh Moc.
TaskDescLanguage.19: Destroy 300 ferocious flames that evolve in the spiritual wood
TaskDescLanguage.20: Destroy 300 friendly snakes that evolve in the spiritual wood
TaskDescLanguage.21: Destroy 300 mischievous foxes that evolved in Linh Moc
TaskDescLanguage.22: Destroy 500 evolved white tigers in Linh Moc
TaskDescLanguage.23: Thank you, Hero, thanks to you, this forest is peaceful again :D Please choose one more companion for yourself.
TaskDescLanguage.24: Reach level 20: Go meet the thugs, there are a lot of wild animals nearby, help me destroy them: Destroy 500 illusory white tigers
TaskDescLanguage.29: You are really strong, please try your strength with my pet
TaskDescLanguage.30: Well, thank you very much for helping me. This is my reward for you
TaskDescLanguage.31: Return to meet the delinquent scientist:
TaskDescLanguage.32: Well, the Brave has already become a talented pet trainer. Let's try a little more and help us defeat the level 15 death boss in Linh Lam.
TaskDescLanguage.33: Destroy the death boss level 20 in the great spirit realm
TaskDescLanguage.34: Destroy the death boss level 25 in Linh Moc
TaskDescLanguage.35: Destroy the level 30 death boss on the way up the mountain
TaskDescLanguage.37: I have nothing more to advise the brave warrior......
TaskDescLanguage.38: Hit 100 friendly snakes in Linh Lam = 10 accumulated points
TaskDescLanguage.39: Beat 100 little cats in Linh Lam = 10 points
TaskDescLanguage.40: Hit 100 pikachu in Linh Lam = 10 points
TaskDescLanguage.41: Hit 100 baby turtles at Linh Lam = 10 points
TaskDescLanguage.42: Play 100 mimon in Linh Lam = 10 points
TaskDescLanguage.43: Hit 20 friendly snakes, 20 pikachu, 20 baby turtles, 20 mimon, 20 little cats in Linh Lam = 10 points
TaskDescLanguage.44: Hit 25 friendly snakes, 25 pikachu, 25 baby turtles, 25 mimon in Linh Lam = 10 points
TaskDescLanguage.45: Fighting 200 friendly snakes in Linh Lam = 25 points
TaskDescLanguage.46: Beat 200 little cats in Linh Lam = 25 points
TaskDescLanguage.47: beat 200 pikachu in Linh Lam = 25 points
TaskDescLanguage.48: Hit 200 baby turtles in Linh Lam = 25 points
TaskDescLanguage.49: Play 200 mimon in Linh Lam = 25 points

SkillDescLanguage.101: Increases damage by 100%, each level + 25% when enhanced
SkillDescLanguage.102: Deals 10% damage and reduces enemy attack power by 10% for 3 turns + 4% more per level when enhanced
SkillDescLanguage.103: Increases own attack power by 20% for 3 turns + 8% more per level when enhanced
SkillDescLanguage.104: Deals 10% damage and reduces enemy attack power by 10% for 3 turns + 4% more per level when enhanced
SkillDescLanguage.105: Deals 100% damage and 50% paralysis to the enemy for 1 turn + an additional 5% paralysis to the enemy per level when enhanced
SkillDescLanguage.106: Increases damage by 100%, each level + 25% when enhanced
SkillDescLanguage.107: Minus 5% of enemy's health for 3 turns, + add 1% per level when enhanced
SkillDescLanguage.108: Increase damage by 450%, 60% miss, each level -6% miss chance when enhanced
SkillDescLanguage.109: Avoid attacks by 50% for 3 turns, + add 2% per level when enhanced
SkillDescLanguage.110: Reflects 50% of damage taken from the enemy for 2 turns, + an additional 1% per level when enhanced
SkillDescLanguage.111: Deals 120% damage and restores 10% health from damage dealt, each level + 1% more lifesteal when enhanced
SkillDescLanguage.112: Deals 40% damage + burns 40% of the enemy's mana, + adds 4% mana burn per level when enhanced
SkillDescLanguage.113: Increase damage by 500%, 60% miss, each level -6% miss chance when enhanced
SkillDescLanguage.114: Deals 10% damage and reduces enemy attack power by 10% for 3 turns + 4% more per level when enhanced
SkillDescLanguage.115: Increases own armor by 50% for 3 turns, + 5% for each level when enhanced
SkillDescLanguage.116: Creates a whirlwind that deals 10% damage and reduces enemy attack power by 10% for 3 turns + 4% more per level
SkillDescLanguage.117: Take the surrounding air and create an anger that increases your attack power by 20% for 3 turns + 8% more for each level.
SkillDescLanguage.118: What is the rebound that deals damage and reflects 50% of the damage taken from the opponent for 2 turns, + 1% more each level?
SkillDescLanguage.119: A seedling appears from underground, subtracting 5% of the enemy's health for 3 turns, + 1% more each level.
SkillDescLanguage.120: Try to bring down a hammer from the sky, dealing 100% damage, each level + 25% more.
SkillDescLanguage.121: Relying on a flying sword, it deals 500% high damage and 60% missed damage, each level -6% missed rate.
SkillDescLanguage.122: There is a hidden weapon here that deals great damage and can miss, causing 450% damage and 60% miss, each level -6% miss rate.
SkillDescLanguage.123: A flash of electricity deals 100% damage and 50% paralysis to the enemy for 1 turn + an additional 5% paralysis to the enemy per level.
SkillDescLanguage.124: Creates a meteor shower that deals 100% damage + 25% per level
SkillDescLanguage.125: Deals damage and weakens the enemy, dealing 10% damage and reducing the enemy's attack power by 10% for 3 turns + 4% more per level
SkillDescLanguage.126: An assassin hides behind flower petals and dodges for 3 turns. Avoid attacks by 50% for 3 turns, + add 2% per level.
SkillDescLanguage.127: Creates shield from hell for 3 turns increases own armor by 50%, + 5% more each level
SkillDescLanguage.128: stamina is gradually depleted because of something that deals 120% damage and restores 10% health from damage dealt, each level + 1% more lifesteal
SkillDescLanguage.129: Deals damage and burns the enemy's MP based on the damage dealt, dealing 50% of the damage + burns the opponent's mana, + 5% more per level
SkillDescLanguage.130: Creates a strong shock, causing damage and reducing enemy ATK, dealing 10% damage and reducing enemy attack power by 10% for 3 turns + 4% more per level
